title: Submarine Lab Adventure #20
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Flooded Research Lab
rooms.description: Emergency lights cast an eerie red glow through knee-deep water in the damaged research laboratory. Sparks fly from exposed wiring overhead. Computer monitors flicker with error messages. The submarine has taken critical damage and is slowly sinking. You need to reach the escape pod before it's too late.

items.name: damaged research terminal
items.description: A waterlogged computer terminal still displaying some data
items.text: RESEARCH LOG - Dr. Chen, Lead Scientist. Project depth: 8000 meters. Emergency protocol: Access code based on maximum operational depth. Remember: 8-0-0-0.

items.name: metal supply cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with emergency supplies, partially submerged in water

items.name: emergency procedures manual
items.description: A waterproof manual with safety protocols
items.text: EMERGENCY PROCEDURES: In case of hull breach, proceed to Control Room. Lead scientist Dr. Chen has override authority. All personnel must know: Research station designation is Deep Sea Station Mariana.

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard labeled 'Control Room Access'

items.name: laboratory workbench
items.description: A metal workbench covered with research equipment and scattered papers

items.name: scattered research notes
items.text: Notes: Specimen collection from Mariana Trench successful. Dr. Chen approved all protocols. Storage location: Biological samples kept in secure freezer in control room.

items.name: pressure sealed door
items.description: A heavy reinforced door with a card reader, leading to the control room

rooms.name: Submarine Control Room
rooms.description: The nerve center of the submarine, filled with blinking control panels and navigation equipment. Warning klaxons blare intermittently. A large viewport shows the dark ocean depths outside. Personal lockers line one wall, and the escape pod access hatch is visible on the far side of the room.

items.name: main navigation console
items.description: The primary control station with depth gauges and position displays
items.text: CURRENT POSITION: Mariana Trench, 8000 meters depth. HULL INTEGRITY: 23% and falling. RECOMMENDATION: Immediate evacuation required.

items.name: crew roster board
items.description: A board listing all submarine personnel
items.text: CREW MANIFEST: Captain Rodriguez (Commander), Dr. Chen (Lead Scientist), Engineer Park (Systems), Dr. Okafor (Biology), Pilot Santos (Navigation). MISSION: Deep sea research expedition.

items.name: crew locker
items.description: A metal locker with a nameplate reading 'Dr Chen'

items.name: personal log journal
items.description: A private journal belonging to the lead scientist
items.text: Personal Log - Dr. Chen: This mission to the Mariana Trench has been incredible. As lead scientist, I'm proud of our work. The specimens we've collected will revolutionize marine biology. My security clearance allows me access to all systems.

items.name: biological storage freezer
items.description: A secure freezer unit for storing research specimens

items.name: emergency locator beacon
items.description: A bright orange emergency beacon device

items.name: escape pod access hatch
items.description: A sealed hatch leading to the emergency escape pod. A security terminal displays three verification questions.

password_questions.question: What is the station designation?
password_questions.hint: The emergency manual contains this information

password_questions.question: Where are biological samples stored?
password_questions.hint: Look at the research notes from the lab

rooms.name: Emergency Escape Pod
rooms.description: You've made it to the escape pod! A small spherical chamber with a single seat and emergency controls. Through the viewport, you can see the damaged submarine falling away into the darkness below. The pod's engines hum to life, ready to carry you to the surface.

items.name: escape pod controls
items.description: A simple control panel with a large red launch button

items.name: emergency survival kit
items.description: A kit containing food, water, and first aid supplies

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You launch the escape pod and rocket toward the surface. The damaged submarine disappears into the abyssal depths below. After what feels like an eternity, you break through the waves into sunlight. A rescue ship spots your emergency beacon and moves to pick you up. You've survived the disaster at Deep Sea Station Mariana! You win!
